lyrics:
6 contributorslavender girl lyricsverse 1
id never danced
til i danced with you my love
couldnt hear the music
but im sure it was good stuff
id never sang
with a tear falling from my eye
and every time i lose it
oh and im not afraid to cry

verse 2
id never spoke
to one like you before
told you all my secrets
and you wanted more
id never looked
into eyes as clear as yours
and every time i lose it
nothing matters more

if the superstitions got you down
